name: What is Coinbase Base: Onchain is the next Online
description: Learn about the exciting onchain world with a presentation from Kelvin Chang, a product manager at Coinbase, where he will cover what is Coinbase Base, the L2 ecosystem, and how to build on Base.

speakers.name: Kelvin Chang
speakers.bio:
Product Manager, Coinbase Institutional Financing
Senior Product Advisor, Sustainable Bitcoin Protocol (SBP)
